issue.title: Problem building the docker solution images based on a local file system

content.raw:
Thank you very much for the hint. We tried to use COPY, but we were only able to copy files that are positioned in the folder where the DOCKERFILE is stored. This seems to me also the case in the example in subt\_team\_entry. Using ../../ with COPY creates an error.

I will try to explain our problem in more detail: We have one project that was based on subt\_seed where all the source-files are stored on the local file system. For the submission of our solution we need a docker image for each robot. To be able to use the COPY command it seems that we need to copy the source-files in every docker-image-build-folder to have them available during the docker - build process. 

Is there a special option for using COPY or is there another solution for this?
